dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2547 IH: Special Diabetes Program for Indians Reauthorization Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cole (for himself and Mr. Ruiz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to extend funding for special diabetes programs for Indians.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Special Diabetes Program for Indians Reauthorization Act of 2023.

section.header: Extending funding for special diabetes programs for Indians
section.text: Section 330C(c)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254c–3(c)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking and at the end;
in subparagraph (D), by striking the period and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: $150,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028, to remain available until expended.
